ibis.ipl
Class IbisCapabilities

java.lang.Object
  ibis.ipl.CapabilitySet
      ibis.ipl.IbisCapabilities

public final class IbisCapabilities
extends CapabilitySet

This class describes the capabilities of an ibis instance. Combined with a list of PortType it is used to select a particular Ibis implementation. See the createIbis method from IbisFactory.

Field Detail

CLOSED_WORLD

public static final String CLOSED_WORLD
Capability, set when the Ibises that can join the pool are determined at the start of the run. This enables the methods Registry.getPoolSize() and Registry.waitUntilPoolClosed(). When this capability is requested, the Ibis property ibis.pool.size must be set to the number of Ibis instances that can join the run. When ibis.pool.size instances have joined, the pool is closed: no more instances are allowed to join the run.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SIGNALS

public static final String SIGNALS
Capability, indicating that signals are supported, see RegistryEventHandler.gotSignal(String,IbisIdentifier) and Registry.signal(String, IbisIdentifier...).

See Also:
Constant Field Values
WARNING: This is an Experimental feature of the IPL. It may not function correctly, future releases of the IPL may have a revised API for this feature, or it may be removed completely.

TERMINATION

public static final String TERMINATION
Capability, indicating that termination is supported, see RegistryEventHandler.poolTerminated(IbisIdentifier) and Registry.terminate().

See Also:
Constant Field Values
WARNING: This is an Experimental feature of the IPL. It may not function correctly, future releases of the IPL may have a revised API for this feature, or it may be removed completely.

ELECTIONS_UNRELIABLE

public static final String ELECTIONS_UNRELIABLE
Capability, indicating that elections are supported but don't have to be reliable, always give the same result, etc.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ELECTIONS_STRICT

public static final String ELECTIONS_STRICT
Capability, indicating that elections are supported, reliable, and give consistent results.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MEMBERSHIP_UNRELIABLE

public static final String MEMBERSHIP_UNRELIABLE
Capability indicating membership administration, but joins/leaves don't have to be reliable, in order, etc.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MEMBERSHIP_TOTALLY_ORDERED

public static final String MEMBERSHIP_TOTALLY_ORDERED
Capability indicating membership administration, and joins/leaves are totally ordered. This means that all Ibis instances receive the joins/leaves upcalls in the same order.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MALLEABLE

public static final String MALLEABLE
Capability indicating an Ibis that can deal with malleability. This means that Ibis instances can join and/or leave a run at any time.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
